alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 17 at 10:39AM EST until December 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches in the most persistent lake snows. The heaviest snow on Sunday in southern Erie county will be south of a line from Eden to the Boston Hills, including Springville. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph on Sunday will result in patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult at times with deep snow cover on roads and poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4289 7859 4296 7859 4299 7866 4297 7893 4293 7897 4288 7889 4279 7890 4273 7894 4280 7878 4282 7872 TIME Y22M12D18T0000Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z COORD...4249 7850 4259 7837 4270 7838 4275 7873 4266 7916 4232 7975 4221 7976 4223 7944 4234 7900 4241 7878 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D18T1200Z COORD...4257 7819 4275 7843 4269 7901 4257 7931 4232 7975 4199 7977 4200 7941 4212 7898 4226 7878 4233 7841 TIME Y22M12D18T1200Z-Y22M12D19T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
